txt.en: 'The third ingredient I need are some clumps of club moss. You can find it growing among the rocks at the edge of the river to the north-west.'
Bring the club moss to Enit at Galar Culch
'I trust this task was not overly difficult? The forest can be frightening to those who do not understand its ways.'
'I trust this task was not overly difficult? The forest can be frightening to those who do not understand its ways.'
Rituals of the Forest - Creeping Moss
Enit has asked you to retrieve several pieces of club moss as part of a ritual to summon one of the spirits of the forest.
The moss Enit has requested can be gathered along the edge of the river in the north-west region of the Mournshaws.
Bring the club moss to Enit at Galar Culch
Enit is at Galar Culch in the Mournshaws.\n\nYou should bring the club moss you have collected to Enit.
